name: Life After BOB: The Chalice Study Experience (LABX)

metadata.name: LABX #1/10
metadata.description:
Digital certificate of authenticity for Life After BOB: The Chalice Study Experience (LABX), real-time story and simulation, by Ian Cheng.

This NFT certificate accompanies the LABX artwork, packaged as a stand-alone LABX.app and distributed to the owner. Unlock registration of LABX.app using this NFT.

LABX encompasses two presentational modes: CINEMA Mode and WORLDWATCHING Mode. CINEMA Mode presents the 50min narrative episode Life After BOB: The Chalice Study, in real-time. WORLDWATCHING Mode allows the viewer to interactively explore the world of LAB, using their smartphone to pause a scene and examine any character, artifact, or entity on screen.

LABX is produced and published by Metis Suns.

attributes.value: Life After BOB: The Chalice Study Experience (LABX)
